'''Marvelous Merchandise''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 5.1]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2024/11/11 10:00 - 2024/11/18 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 12 or above

===Summary===
* During the event period, [[Liben]] will randomly provide Travelers with seven different types of Box o' Marvels rewards. After exchanging for Boxes o' Marvels five times, a Mega Box o' Marvels will be unlocked, which provides Travelers with additional rewards that include [[Primogem]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], [[Mystic Enhancement Ore]], and [[Mora]].
